translations.translation: Then he said to them on oath: "I am your sincere friend;"
And he swore to them both: 'Surely I am your sincere adviser.'
Satan swore before them that he was giving them good advice.
And he swore to them, “Indeed I am a well-wisher for both of you.”
And he Qasamahuma: "Verily, I am one of the sincere well-wishers for you both."
And he swore to them both: Most surely I am a sincere adviser to you.
And he swore to them, 'Truly, I am for you a sincere adviser.'
And he swore unto them (saying): Lo! I am a sincere adviser unto you.
and he swore to them, "Surely, I am your well-wisher."
And he sware unto them both: verily I am unto you of your good counsellors.
And he swore to them, ‘I am indeed your well-wisher.’
And he swore to them both, that he was their sincere adviser.
And he [Shaitan (Satan)] swore by Allah to them both (saying): "Verily, I am one of the sincere well-wishers for you both."
he swore to both: 'Indeed, I am to you among the advisers'
And he swore to them, “I am a sincere advisor to you.”
And he swore [by Allah] to them, "Indeed, I am to you from among the sincere advisors."
[7:21] And he swore to both of them, that is, he swore to both of them by God, ‘Truly, I am a sincere adviser to you’, in this matter.
(And he swore unto them (saying): Lo! I am a sincere adviser unto you) in my oath that this is the tree of immortality. 158

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { وَقَاسَمَهُمَآ } معناه حَلَفَ لَهُمَا

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَ } بعدما نصحهما وأشفقهما وسمعا منه ما سمعا { قَاسَمَهُمَآ } أي: بادر إلى القسم تأكيداً وترويجاً لقوله إياهما قائلاً: { إِنِّي لَكُمَا لَمِنَ ٱلنَّاصِحِينَ } [الأعراف: 21] المشفقين المريدين خيركما

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
[طه:122]، فصار عليه السلام خليفة لله في أرضه، بعد أن كان جارًا له في داره، فكم بين الخليفة والجار؟ { وقاسَمَهُما } أي: خلف لهما { إني لكما لمنَ الناصحين } فيما قلت لكما
 وذكر قَسَم إبليس بصيغة المفاعلة التي تكون بين اثنين مبالغة لأنه اجتهد فيه، أو لأنه أقسم لهما، وأقسما له أن يقبلا نصيحته
